resources.string: You already have a goal of this type

About Author Genie: 
 For more information about AuthorGenie, visit authorgenie.net 
 
 About the app: 
 This application was coded in Java by Ryan Schafer. 
 It is open source and can be used, modified and distributed freely as described under MIT
Set a word or minute goal for the day, week, or month.
Enter the number of words or minutes you\'ve written today. \n[swipe to hide]

array.name: inspire_text
array.item: Close your eyes. Take a breath. Remember why you love this project.
Hey, you’re here. You showed up. You get points for that.
Inner critic getting loud? You are not alone! Mine is named Fred. Yours?
Keep your eyes on your own writing journey. Comparisons are dangerous.
Write words? You are a writer. Not a wannabe. Not an impostor.
Stuck? Try a smaller goal. Small successes keep you coming back.
Your weird, frustrating process is your process. Own it. Make peace with it.
Nobody else could write this like you.
What do you love about this project? Focus on that.
Hey, sometimes you just have to take a nap.
Close your eyes. Breathe. Summon up that magic feeling of flow.
Have you stopped to breathe today? Time for three deep breaths.
Clear the cobwebs with a five-minute free write.
What happens next? Take a walk and carry the question with you.
First drafts are supposed to suck. You can fix it later.
Where does your muse live? In the shower? In your car? Pay a visit.
Say it with me: "I am a writer. I’ve got this."
